name: Sildenafil

contraindications: •for patients , recommended dose 50 mg taken , needed , approximately 1 hour sexual activity . however , sildenafil tablets may taken anywhere 30 minutes 4 hours sexual activity ( 2.1 ) •based effectiveness toleration , may increase maximum 100 mg decrease 25 mg ( 2.1 ) •maximum recommended dosing frequency per day ( 2.1 )
warningsAndPrecautions: sildenafil tablets usp , 50 mg white colored , round-shaped , biconvex , film coated tablets debossed ' ' one side '36'on side . available follows : ndc : 70518-1844-00 ndc : 70518-1844-01 packaging : 30 1 bottle plastic packaging : 30 1 bottle plastic recommended storage : store 20° 25°c ( 68° 77°f ) [ usp controlled room temperature ] . repackaged distributed : remedy repack , inc. 625 kolter dr. suite # 4 indiana , pa 1-724-465-8762

indications_original: Sildenafil tablets are indicated for the treatment of erectile dysfunction.
contraindications_original: •For most patients, the recommended dose is 50 mg taken, as needed, approximately 1 hour before sexual activity. However, sildenafil tablets may be taken anywhere from 30 minutes to 4 hours before sexual activity (2.1) •Based on effectiveness and toleration, may increase to a maximum of 100 mg or decrease to 25 mg (2.1) •Maximum recommended dosing frequency is once per day (2.1)
warningsAndPrecautions_original:
Sildenafil Tablets USP, 50 mg are white colored, round-shaped, biconvex, film coated tablets debossed with ' I ' on one side and '36'on the other side. They are available as follows:
  
                     
NDC: 70518-1844-00
 
                  NDC: 70518-1844-01
                  PACKAGING: 30 in 1 BOTTLE PLASTIC
                  PACKAGING: 30 in 1 BOTTLE PLASTIC 
  
                     
                     Recommended Storage: Store at 20° to 25°C (68° to 77°F) [see USP Controlled Room Temperature].
 
                  
                  Repackaged and Distributed By:
                  Remedy Repack, Inc.
                  625 Kolter Dr. Suite #4 Indiana, PA 1-724-465-8762
adverseReactions_original: •Administration of sildenafil tablets to patients using nitric oxide donors, such as organic nitrates or organic nitrites in any form. Sildenafil tablets were shown to potentiate the hypotensive effect of nitrates ( 4.1 , 7.1 , 12.2 ) •Known hypersensitivity to sildenafil or any component of tablet (4.2) •Administration with guanylate cyclase (GC) stimulators, such as riociguat (4.3)
